alert.note: Alert for Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 8:23PM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations up to a coating and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...The Mohawk and Schoharie valleys, eastern Catskills, portions of the Capital District and the Lake George Saratoga region in eastern New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions on any untreated roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation including freezing rain is expected overnight into Sunday morning with air temperatures at or below freezing. Precipitation should change over to plain rain later Sunday morning as air temperatures rise above freezing. Slippery road conditions are possible which could impact holiday travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
